alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 18 at 12:06AM AKDT until March 18 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Northeast winds gusting to 45 mph. * WHERE...Over summits of the Upper Koyukuk Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel over summits could be difficult. Blowing and drifting snow will cause snow drifts to form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Summits such as Finger Mountain have east winds gusting to 45 mph. This will cause snow drifts to form over summits and make travel difficult over summits. Winds are much less in valleys. Winds are expected to decrease Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
